availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Holloway (Eddyville, Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Eddyville, Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Robert Holloway and Catharine Holloway. Married to Pamela Satterfield. Farmer in Eddyville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 378B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 707.
Find A Grave, "William H. Holloway (1838-1890)," Memorial #6656753, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6656753 (accessed June 11, 2020).
